Monol's "Beam" technique
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Monol's "Beam" technique
By Azulazulazula on Sunday, January 8, 2012 - 12:40 pm:

In the list of Monol Techniques, it is stated the "Beam" requires 350 INT. I'm not sure if I got lucky, if my game has a bug, or what's going on, but in my game, my monol (who, at the time, had 143 INT) received Beam from Papas.

By Azulazulazula on Sunday, January 8, 2012 - 12:42 pm:

Sorry for the double post, but I thought it would be a good idea to make note of this: It was a pure Monol, 1st generation (my very first game monster on my new data, actually), under a year old.

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, January 8, 2012 - 09:54 pm:

Ok thanks, the tech info was a group project which may not have been compiled as carefully as it should have been...

By Azulazulazula on Sunday, January 15, 2012 - 05:19 pm:

Another note; Pyramid does /not/ require 450 INT. I just sent my 3 yr., 7 mo. Jell/Golem to get Gattling Gun from Kawrea; I ended up getting Pyramid, with 319 INT.
